message_catalog.msg:
Please confirm that you would like to close your account at %system_name%.

Closing your account means that we will no longer send you email notifications, nor will you show up in lists of members at %system_name%. Your contributions to the community, however, will be preserved, as they're part of the community's history.

Note that you may reopen your account at any time, simply by logging in again.
Note that you can delete your saved email address and password by choosing the "log out" option from your workspace.
Are you sure that you want to delete this user's portrait?
Are you sure that you want to delete your portrait?
